main_definition: Afternoon refers to the time of day between noon (midday) and evening, specifically from 12:00 PM (noon) to around 6:00 PM or sunset.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A specific part of a larger period
meanings_and_examples.example: She had a busy afternoon working on her project.

meanings_and_examples.definition: The time after lunch when people often take breaks or relax
meanings_and_examples.example: They decided to have an afternoon tea party at 3 PM.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A period of time for a special activity, event, or meeting
meanings_and_examples.example: We have a team-building afternoon session every Thursday.
